description:
This additional content includes:

- "C Fluffy Fur Collar" Palamute layered armor piece
- "C Fluffy Fur Coat" Palamute layered armor piece

Soft, warm, and protects your Palamute all the way up to the neck. Stave off the cold and look stylish while doing so!

Dress up your buddy with this special layered armor!

- Palamute layered armor can be used in the Layered Armor Settings menu of the Buddy Board.
- Layered armor is a "skin" which changes the appearance of the character without affecting their stats and abilities.
name: "Canyne Fluffy Fur" Palamute layered armor set
